commitResults.messageTitle: Update Duke.java: Add increment level-0
Add printMessage helper function for pretty printing Duke's output
Add echo functionality for duke
Add feature for * Storing user input in a list * Displaying the list in a formatted manner with the `list` command
Add Task class to encapsulate details of each task Feat: `list` now shows the whether or not a task has been done Feat: `mark` and `unmark` commands to mark or unmark a task as done
Fix bug where the task name is not fully recorded Add prompt character when waiting for user input
Format files according to the specified coding standards
Add javadocs for all Duke methods

Feat: print the text in nice little ascii box with the new TextFormatter class Util: Makefile added for easy compilation and running Refactor: refactor code to use packages, namespace the code under wilsonoh.sagyo Others: customize app name from duke to sagyo
Major refactor: use the gradle build automation tool for building, running and testing the project
Add test_Resources test
Add checkstyle using gradle checkstyle plugin Fix files according to checkstyle errors
Add exclusions for the AvoidStarImports checkstyle module for cleaner code
Comment out unnecessary checkstyle setting in build.gradle

Add increment Level-4: * Different types of tasks: deadline, todo and event * Add a parser class for parsing the different types of events * Update the runtest.sh script to use gradle, update EXPECTED.txt and input.txt
Update junit tests to reflect Level-4 changes
Remove old (pre-gradle) src directory

Added Level-5 increment features: * Handle incorrect input and provide helpful error messages * Refactored code to let CommandParser handle all input parsing * Introduce Command class to handle command message and execution * Update command parsing regex pattern to be more robust and error-aware
Show message when running list command on empty list Fix bug where bye command doesn't display message
Add delete command to delete tasks by index
Update deadline command shortfrom to dl for clarity
Add persistant storage for tasks
Remove explicit WRITE command, write to file whenever changes are made to tasks
Update .clang-format to always separate blocks by newline
Change ColorCodes to be an enum and print error messages in red
Coding Style: make class parameters final whenever possible
Update .clang-format to always separate blocks by newline
Change ColorCodes to be an enum and print error messages in red
Coding Style: make class parameters final whenever possible
Add persistant storage for tasks
Remove explicit WRITE command, write to file whenever changes are made to tasks
Add shortform command for task deletion
